official_title: A bill to apply to imported machinery for making pulp, paper, or paperboard the same duty as the country of origin of that machinery applies to machinery of that kind that is a product of the United States and is exported to that country.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Commissioner of Customs to apply to imported machinery used for making cellulosic pulp, paper, or paperboard the same duty as the country of origin of such machinery applies to like U.S. machinery that is exported to that country. Makes conforming amendments.

titles.title: A bill to apply to imported machinery for making pulp, paper, or paperboard the same duty as the country of origin of that machinery applies to machinery of that kind that is a product of the United States and is exported to that country.
